title: Vegetarian nut roast pie with cranberries
description: Although this is a veggie roast, this truly is a meal fit for a king. I admit this is not the shortest of recipes, but it is really satisfying to make and the pastry is brilliantly quick and simple. For this recipe you will need an 18cm/7in springform cake tin.
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz mixed nuts (e.g. pecans, cashews and hazelnuts)
125g/4½oz plain flour, plus extra for rolling out the pastry
1 free-range egg, plus 1 free-range egg, beaten, to glaze
salt and freshly ground black pepper
